The module returned the following error:
The domain registration request was successfully submitted to the registry.
Invalid name server address(es) entered. Please provide at least two valid name servers.
The name servers were successfully updated.

The domain transfer request was successfully sent. The current owner of the domain will now receive an email asking them to confirm the transfer. They may also be asked to enter the domain transfer code. The previous registrar will then process the transfer request. Once this is completed, you'll be able to manage the domain from this page.

Remember to unlock the domain at its current registrar before attempting to transfer it. Please also note that it is not possible to transfer domains that were registered, renewed or transferred within the last 60 days.
Saving this page will delete the domain record from your registrar and make the domain immediately inactive. This can not be reversed.
This will permanently delete the local domain and purchase record.
The client has no payment accounts on record.
Store account data at merchant gateway if supported (recommended).

There was a problem decrypting the data. This may be caused by either an invalid decryption passphrase being entered, or the requested data does not exist. Please reload the current page to try again.
Note: All decrypt actions are logged.
The {field} field contained an invalid value.

Note: This can be a language phrase.
Populate this with a JSON array of options  if you are using a select field. The option names can contain language phrases.
We support a range of validation options on fields. Please see the WHSuite custom field documentation for full details.
There was an error deleting the custom field. Please try again.
If enabled, accounts will automatically be setup on the default server until it's full, and will then be automatically distributed across other servers in the group.
The server module assigned here will be used for all servers within this group.
If you use a 3rd party public server monitoring service, you can enter the URL for this server here and a link will be provided in your client area for customers on this server.

Deployment Priority lets you set a priority level for each server. A priority of 1 is the highest. If you have thousands of servers you can prioritize accounts to fill each server before moving onto the next. Zero is the lowest priority level.
There was a problem establishing a connection to the server. Please check the connection details and try again.
The Server IP Addresses were successfully updated.
The IP Address(es) entered were invalid. Please try again.
The IP Address(es) entered already exist on the system. Please try again.
There was an error saving the IP Address(es). Please try again.

The default server will be used as the highest priority when setting up accounts. Once the default server reaches it's account limit, WHSuite will automatically start assigning accounts to other servers based on their Deployment Priority level.
The server nameservers were successfully saved.
There was an error saving the server nameservers. Please try again.

Leave blank to keep existing value.
The product group was successfully updated
There was an error updating the product group. Please try again.
The product group was successfully added.

This will be the email sent to the client once their order has been successfully created, and can include product purchase details.
Optional. Set to -1 to disable stock control.
Set how many days after being overdue to suspend accounts.
Set how many days after being overdue to terminate accounts.
The product addon you selected can't be deleted as it's been purchased. Instead you should unassign it from all products.

If this addon ties into a 3rd party server  or registrar addon, it's possible to use a slug and value which can be used to automatically setup this addon. See the full WHSuite documentation for more details.
The domain type can be used to specify if you want customers to enter an existing domain name (e.g for Shared/Reseller hosting), no domain (e.g for VoIP) or a hostname (e.g for a VPS/Server).
To set a product to free, use the 'Product  is free' option on the billing settings. For any billing periods or currencies you don't want to allow, leave their fields below blank.

If the pricing for a year is left blank, the domain price will be worked out based on the lowest supported number of years. If no pricing is proivded at all, registration in the selected currency will be disabled.
Unable to capture payment. This is likely due to the client not having a valid Credit/Debit card or ACH account on file.
You can disable a credit card if it is either not yet active, or if you wish to keep it on file but use another card for automated payments.
You can disable an ACH account if it is either not yet active, or if you wish to keep it on file but use another account for automated payments.
You can set this card to be the default method when taking automated payments.
You can set this account to be the default method when taking automated payments.
Your Credit/Debit Card payment was successful.
Your Credit/Debit Card payment was unsuccessful. Please try again or contact us for assistance.
Your ACH account payment was successful.
Your ACH account payment was unsuccessful. Please try again or contact us for assistance.
An error occurred taking your payment. Please try again or contact us for assistance.
Once you terminate an order, each associated service will also be terminated. In addition, any outstanding invoices for any services that are part of this order will be marked as void.
The order has been marked as active. Any order items have also been instructed to activate using their individual control panels or service providers.
The order status has been updated.
An error occurred updating the order status. Please try again.
Restrict to clients who use this language.
An error occurred when installing the addon. Please check that your account has write permissions in the addon directory and try again.

An error occurred when disabling the addon. Please try again.
An error occurred when uninstalling the addon. Please try again.

An error occurred when updating the addon. Please try again.

WHSuite provides the (recommended) option of setting a security passphrase. This is used to protect your customers credit card and bank details. Whilst a passphrase is not required for the encryption of customer data, it does add an extra layer of security, as the data can not be retrieved without the passphrase.

There are however a few points you should note before entering a passphrase; once a passphrase is set, you will need to remember it. It's not stored anywhere at all, so if you lose it, you lose anything encrypted with it. In addition, automated payments via cron will no longer work, as the passphrase will need to be entered manually to decrypt the payment details.

We highly recommend using a passphrase, and accept no responsibility for the security or storage of your customers data. If you choose not to use a passphrase, you should consider using a 3rd party provider for storing your credit card details.
The current passphrase was not valid. Please try again.

The WHSuite addons directory is not currently writable. This will prevent any addons from being installed or updated.
A receipt transaction will add funds to the client's credit balance. A debit transaction will remove funds from the client's credit balance.
The transaction record was successfully marked as refunded.
The transaction record was successfully updated.
The domain does not appear to be registered, or there was an error communicating with the registration service.

There was a problem processing the domain transfer request. Please check the domain transfer code (if applicable) was correct, and that the domain is unlocked at it's current registrar. The domain must also be at leat 60 days old to be eligible for transfer.
Permission Denied. You do not have sufficient privileges to access this page.
The contact profile was saved successfully.
The contact profile was deleted successfully.
The contact profile you selected could not be deleted. This may be due to the contact profile being in use for one of your domains.

The English language pack is restricted. You cannot remove this as it is used for "fallbacks" when certain strings don't exist in other languages.

To enable payment gateways for this currency, drag them from the left hand list of available currencies into the selected currencies section on the right. You can then drag them up and down to set the display order. To remove a gateway, drag it back onto the available gateways section.

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Your account password has been reset.
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your password at {{settings.general.sitename}} has been reset either by yourself or a staff member. If you did not request a new password, please contact us immediately.

Your new account password is: {{password}}

We recommend you change this to something secure and memorable as soon as possible.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your password at {{settings.general.sitename}} has been reset either by yourself or a staff member. If you did not request a new password, please contact us immediately.

Your new account password is: {{password}}

We recommend you change this to something secure and memorable as soon as possible.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your password at {{settings.general.sitename}} has been reset either by yourself or a staff member. If you did not request a new password, please contact us immediately.

===============================================================
Your new account password is: {{password}}
===============================================================

We recommend you change this to something secure and memorable as soon as possible.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your password at {{settings.general.sitename}} has been reset either by yourself or a staff member. If you did not request a new password, please contact us immediately.

===============================================================
Your new account password is: {{password}}
===============================================================

We recommend you change this to something secure and memorable as soon as possible.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: {{settings.general.sitename}} Invoice no. {{invoice.invoice_no}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Please find attached your latest invoice for services purchased from {{settings.general.sitename}}. Please note that this invoice is due on or before {{invoice.date_due}}.

You can log into your account to pay this invoice, by visiting {{settings.general.site_url}}.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Please find attached your latest invoice for services purchased from {{settings.general.sitename}}. Please note that this invoice is due on or before {{invoice.date_due}}.

You can log into your account to pay this invoice, by visiting {{settings.general.site_url}}.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Please find attached your latest invoice for services purchased from {{settings.general.sitename}}. Please note that this invoice is due on or before {{invoice.date_due}}.

You can log into your account to pay this invoice, by visiting {{settings.general.site_url}}.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: ACH Account Payment Failed
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

We attempted to charge your ACH payment account for your {{settings.general.site_name}} account, however the payment failed.

This could be due to out dated account details, or a problem retrieving the funds from your account.

Please review your payment account details to ensure your services are not interrupted due to non-payment.

Total Payment Attempted: {{total_payment}}
Last 4 digits of ACH account: {{ach.account_last4}}

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

We attempted to charge your ACH payment account for your {{settings.general.site_name}} account, however the payment failed.

This could be due to out dated account details, or a problem retrieving the funds from your account.

Please review your payment account details to ensure your services are not interrupted due to non-payment.

Total Payment Attempted: {{total_payment}}
Last 4 digits of ACH account: {{ach.account_last4}}

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Credit Card Payment Failed
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

We attempted to charge your stored credit/debit card for your {{settings.general.sitename}} account, however the payment failed.

This could be due to out dated account details, or a problem retrieving the funds from your account.

Please review your payment account details to ensure your services are not interrupted due to non-payment.

Total Payment Attempted: {{total_payment}}
Last 4 digits of card: {{cc.account_last4}}

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

We attempted to charge your stored credit/debit card for your {{settings.general.sitename}} account, however the payment failed.

This could be due to out dated account details, or a problem retrieving the funds from your account.

Please review your payment account details to ensure your services are not interrupted due to non-payment.

Total Payment Attempted: {{total_payment}}
Last 4 digits of card: {{cc.account_last4}}

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Warning: Invoice Overdue (First Notice)
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Please note that you have an invoice at {{settings.general.sitename}} which is now overdue. This is the first overdue notice.

Invoice details:
Invoice No {{invoice.invoice_no}}
Total Due: {{total_due}}
Date Due: {{date_due}}

Please be aware that if payment is not made as soon as possible, your service may be suspended.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Please note that you have an invoice at {{settings.general.sitename}} which is now overdue. This is the first overdue notice.

Invoice details:
Invoice No {{invoice.invoice_no}}
Total Due: {{total_due}}
Date Due: {{date_due}}

Please be aware that if payment is not made as soon as possible, your service may be suspended.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Second Invoice Overdue Notice
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Our records show that an invoice due on {{date_due}} totalling {{total_due}} is now overdue.

This is the second email we have sent regarding non-payment of this service.

To prevent your service(s) from disruption, please ensure your account with us is brought up to date as soon as possible.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plain}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Our records show that an invoice due on {{date_due}} totalling {{total_due}} is now overdue.

This is the second email we have sent regarding non-payment of this service.

To prevent your service(s) from disruption, please ensure your account with us is brought up to date as soon as possible.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plain}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Final Notice: Invoice overdue
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Our records show that an invoice due on {{date_due}} totalling {{total_due}} is now overdue.

This is the third and final email we have sent regarding non-payment of this service. If your service is not paid for, it will be terminated.

To prevent your service(s) from disruption, please ensure your account with us is brought up to date as soon as possible.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

To prevent your service(s) from disruption, please ensure your account with us is brought up to date as soon as possible.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Service Suspended
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your service provided by us has been suspended. This could be due to either late/non payment, or for violation of our terms of service. 

If you feel this change was made in error, please contact us for assistance.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your service provided by us has been suspended. This could be due to either late/non payment, or for violation of our terms of service. 

If you feel this change was made in error, please contact us for assistance.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Your Credit/Debit Card Has Expired
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your credit or debit card ending in {{last_4}}, on file at {{settings.general.sitename}} has expired. Because of this, it has been marked as inactive on your account.

If you still use this card to pay for your services with us, please login to your account and update your payment details to avoid any disruption to services.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Password Reset Request
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

A password reset request for your account at {{settings.sitename}}. If you did not request a new password, you can disregard this email.

To have a new password emailed to you, please confirm your request by going here: {{reset_url}}

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

A password reset request for your account at {{settings.sitename}}. If you did not request a new password, you can disregard this email.

To have a new password emailed to you, please confirm your request by going here: {{reset_url}}

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Your Domain has been renewed
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your domain renewal request for {{domain.domain}} has been processed. Your next renewal date is {{next_renewal}}

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your domain renewal request for {{domain.domain}} has been processed. Your next renewal date is {{next_renewal}}

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Domain Transfer Initiated
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your domain transfer request for {{domain.domain}} has been received. We'll now contact your existing registrar to start the transfer process. 

You may be asked by your previous registrar to confirm the transfer request. Once this has been done, and they have approved the request, please allow approximately five working days for the transfer to complete.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your domain transfer request for {{domain.domain}} has been received. We'll now contact your existing registrar to start the transfer process. 

You may be asked by your previous registrar to confirm the transfer request. Once this has been done, and they have approved the request, please allow approximately five working days for the transfer to complete.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Domain Restore Initiated
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your domain restore request for {{domain.domain}} has been received. We'll now start the restore process.

This please allow up to 24 hours for this to be completed.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Registration confirmation - {{domain.domain}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your domain name, {{domain.domain}} was successfully registered and can now be managed via your customer control panel.

Your next domain renewal date is {{domain.date_expires}}.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your domain name, {{domain.domain}} was successfully registered and can now be managed via your customer control panel.

Your next domain renewal date is {{domain.date_expires}}.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}

Your domain name, {{domain.domain}} was successfully registered and can now be managed via your customer control panel.

Your next domain renewal date is {{domain.date_expires}}.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Password Reset Request
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{staff.first_name}} {{staff.last_name}},

A password reset request for your account at {{settings.general.sitename}}. If you did not request a new password, you can disregard this email.

To have a new password emailed to you, please confirm your request by going here: {{reset_url}}

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{staff.first_name}} {{staff.last_name}},

A password reset request for your account at {{settings.general.sitename}}. If you did not request a new password, you can disregard this email.

To have a new password emailed to you, please confirm your request by going here: {{reset_url}}

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Your account password has been reset.
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{staff.first_name}} {{staff.last_name}},

Your password at {{settings.general.sitename}} has been reset either by yourself or a staff member. If you did not request a new password, please contact us immediately.

Your new account password is: {{password}}

We recommend you change this to something secure and memorable as soon as possible.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{staff.first_name}} {{staff.last_name}},

Your password at {{settings.general.sitename}} has been reset either by yourself or a staff member. If you did not request a new password, please contact us immediately.

Your new account password is: {{password}}

We recommend you change this to something secure and memorable as soon as possible.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body_default:
Dear {{staff.first_name}} {{staff.last_name}},

Your password at {{settings.general.sitename}} has been reset either by yourself or a staff member. If you did not request a new password, please contact us immediately.

===============================================================
Your new account password is: {{password}}
===============================================================

We recommend you change this to something secure and memorable as soon as possible.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body:
Dear {{staff.first_name}} {{staff.last_name}},

Your password at {{settings.general.sitename}} has been reset either by yourself or a staff member. If you did not request a new password, please contact us immediately.

===============================================================
Your new account password is: {{password}}
===============================================================

We recommend you change this to something secure and memorable as soon as possible.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Your new hosting service is ready!
Service Terminated
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your service provided by us has been terminated. This could be due to either late/non payment, or for violation of our terms of service. 

If you feel this change was made in error, please contact us for assistance.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body:

If you feel this change was made in error, please contact us for assistance.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}}
